divs: sighting detailsme and a friend were sitting on a bench facing the se in a small park between the buildings in my neighbourhood, i was actually talking about ufos and chemtrails and such with a friend of mine, when i saw 2 bright warm white lights like the headlights on a car slowly flying towards us, i told my friend who turned around and we watched the lights slowly fly in a straight line passing just over us, but while passing we could see it was first 2 lights then another came into view making it a boomerang shape, then it turned a little more triangular and a small fourth light came in to view... then you could see a small coldwhite strobe on the rear blinking every couple of seconds... then when it was flying away more lights on the sides could be seen... i shone a my 125 green laser on the aft of it.. but no reaction or reflection, also there as no sound only in the beginning you could hear a distant jet like sound like before a jet is going to pass but when it flew over us not a sound could be heard we waited for the sound after it went away but none to be heard... we wasnt very surprised actually since this has been a very strange weekend.... i had my 7x monocular with me and here is where im stuck... my monocular wont let me see stars because its blurry... but trees and airplaines not to far away can be seen pretty sharp... but this was totally blurred no matter how far i tried to turn the focus... just seems plausible that this may be the reason i didnt hear it maybe it was traveling fast and high.... but to the naked eye it seemed about 600 meters away maybe 900 meters high..' either it was a silent airplane with black body and no colored strobes... or it was a huge craft traveling really far up, im going with the latter... anyway we went home and made a very very good song... oh by the way.. what do you think about this... was playing around with the calculator a few months ago, when i came across this... 2012\366*666=3661,18 2012 has 366 days in it and 3661.18 is the orbit zachariah sitchin said to be nibiru planet x, the annunaki homeworld... kinda wierd hehehe peacilation in the nation phoenix
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sollentuna
